attributes.review: The second this app was downloaded I immediately blacked out. While I was unconscious I had terrible fever dreams regarding Trumps son, Barron. It was like I was seeing his perspective. I was verbally abused, starved, and trump even took my roblox away. Then after attempting to escape the White House, I was caught and put in a cage! Then the dream ended and I awoke in a cold sweat gasping for air. I was chained to a table and surrounded by people in white robes. They kept asking me if I would join trump and aid in completing his great plan for America, however they could not form complete sentences and every third word they said was â€œwallâ€. Then they left me alone to go eat lunch I pulled out my phone, deleted the app and, again, immediately blacked out. I then woke up at home and only six minutes had passed.
